nano.remexp.net
Interface SocketReceiver

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientApplet, FilteringPool
public interface SocketReceiver

An interface that enables classes to receive sockets from connectors.

Version:
1.1 23.08.2012
Author:
Dominic Bosch

A new socket has been found and was reported, thus adding it

Parameters:

port - The local port on which it has been connected.
